| Property   | Attribute   | Description | Type                                                                          | Default     |

| `maxDate`  | `max-date`  |             | `string`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `minDate`  | `min-date`  |             | `string`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `readOnly` | `read-only` |             | `boolean`                                                                     | `false`     |
| `selected` | `selected`  |             | `string`                                                                      | `undefined` |
